Translations.Text: Kaya tumhalahi, jhakuna takanarya (kayamata) ci varta pohacali ahe
Tya divasi bahuteka cehare apamanita asatila
(Ani) duhkhanni pidita kasta - yatanagrasta asatila
Te dhagadhagatya agita ja'una padatila
Ani atisaya usna jharyace pani tyanna pajale ja'ila
Tyancyasathi katedara jhadankherija anakhi kahi khayala nasela
Je na tyanna dhasta pusta karila, na tyanci bhuka mitavila
Bahuteka cehare tya divasi praphulla tavatavita ani (susampanna sthitita) asatila
Apalya karmammule anandita asatila
Ucca (praticya) jannatimmadhye asatila
Jithe konatihi asabhya nirarthaka gosta aikanara nahita
Jithe (sitala) jhare vahata asatila
(Ani) tya (jannatim) madhye unca unca asane asatila
Ani pyale thevalele (asatila)
Ani eka rangeta lavalele takke asatila
Ani ma'u makhamali galice pasaralele asatila
Kaya he untakade nahi pahata ki tyanna kasa prakare nirmana kele gele ahe
Ani akasanna ki kasa prakare unca kele gele ahe
Ani parvatankade, ki kasa prakare gadale gele aheta
Ani jaminikade ki kasa prakare ti bichavili geli ahe
Tara tumhi upadesa karita raha (karana) tumhi phakta upadesa karanare ahata
Tumhi kahi yancyavara dekharekha thevanare nahita
Parantu jo manusya tonda phiravila ani inkara karila
Tyala sarvasrestha allaha phara motha azaba (siksa - yatana) de'ila
Nihsansaya, tyanna tara amacyacakade paratayace ahe
Nihsansaya, tyanca hisoba ghenyaci jababadari amaci ahe
